text:
What to give a child for the New Year
02 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Nastya Raduzhnaya
Several dozens of amazing gifts for children of different ages and temperaments.
Yes, baby products are expensive. But let's be honest: a bright roomy basket for toys is not a gift for a child, but for a mother who is tired of chaos in the nursery. Even a fascinating puzzle is not always the subject of dreams of the baby. Parents want their son to develop, and he is only five, he needs to run around the apartment with a toy gun and yell "Tra-ta-ta!".
All children are different. Depending on the prevailing nervous processes, they, like adults, are divided into sanguine, phlegmatic, choleric and melancholic.
Sanguine - funny chatterbox with awl in one place. Easily involved in any activity and easily switch to something else. Phlegmatic people, on the contrary, kopushi, approach everything with feeling, with sense, with arrangement. They can do the same thing for hours and not get tired. Choleric - mobile, like to play pranks, and better with friends. Excitement and competitiveness - that's what they need. With melancholy, they are clearly out of the way, because they are sensitive and vulnerable. If they lose, they will burst into tears, and noise-gum tires them too quickly. Melancholy people enjoy calm and creative activities.
From 1 year to 4 years
At this time, perception is actively developing, speech and visual-effective thinking are being formed. The child comprehends the world through objects. They give the baby the first idea of shape, size, color, taste and other properties.
After a crisis of three years, the game, still subject and manipulative, becomes the leading activity. The kid plays, as a rule, alone, trying on various roles.
Game tent
The stores have a huge selection of play tents. There are ordinary ones, similar to tourist ones.



It is in the form of a yurt or wigwam.



And there are tents combined with a pipe with a pool for balls. This model will appeal to mobile children.



Game tent - a gift that will suit both boys and girls of any temperament. Calm children will retire there with their favorite toys, and the fidgets will constantly climb up and out, open and close the tent, and play hide and seek.
What to buy


Game tent with AliExpress, 650 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent in the form of a yurt with AliExpress, from 920 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent in the form of a wigwam with AliExpress, 1 446 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent with a pipe and a pool with AliExpress, 1 616 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent from ‚ÄúPlay together‚Äù, 1 354 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent in the form of a puppy from Our Toy, 1 229 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent in the form of a wigwam from Polini, 4 160 rubles ‚Üí


Game tent "Fixics" with a tunnel from "Play Together", 2 169 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive pet
They look exactly like real ones: bark, meow, react to touch, walk, and sometimes even eat and go to the toilet. Only such dogs do not need to be walked, and cats do not rave in the spring.
You can choose a model a la plush toy or as close as possible to a live pet. The latter are more realistic, but not suitable for allergy sufferers.



And such a dog can be walked on a leash.



If your kid is interested in unusual pets, give him a bird with a cage, a mouse or a turtle.



Such a gift will be for the child not only entertainment, because with the help of interactive pets, girls and boys learn to take care of animals.
What to buy


Interactive hamster with AliExpress, 401 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive kitten with AliExpress, 1 246 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive puppy on a leash with AliExpress, 1 710 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive bird in a cage with AliExpress, 829 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive dog Lucy from IMC Toys, 5 939 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive Betsy rabbit from IMC Toys, 1 990 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive parrot Banny from IMC Toys, 2 199 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive dolphin BluBlu from IMC Toys, 3,590 rubles ‚Üí


Musical gifts
If a child shows an interest in music from an early age, he will be happy to find a children's guitar or synthesizer under the tree. The smallest can give xylophone.



But if the child is not very musical, such gifts will quickly become boring to him. Another thing is a carpet singing and blinking with different lights.



If you want - dance on it, if you want - create melodies with your hands. Suitable for both genders and collective games.
What to buy


Children's guitar with AliExpress, from 875 rubles ‚Üí


Children's synthesizer with AliExpress, 716 rubles ‚Üí


Xylophone for children with AliExpress, 493 rubles ‚Üí


Children's music carpet with AliExpress, 696 rubles ‚Üí


Classic World Children's Xylophone, 999 rubles ‚Üí


Children's musical carpet from the "Expert", 2 750 rubles ‚Üí


Finger paint
If melancholy and phlegmatic can still be sat down for drawing with ordinary paints or felt-tip pens, then choleric and sanguine people get bored with this task too quickly. Unless, of course, we are talking about paints with which you can hooligan.
Finger paints develop fine motor skills and imagination, stimulate the creativity of babies.



The main requirement for them is environmental friendliness. It is also good when the set has an easel, an album with tips and other accessories for a young artist.



In addition to finger, you can try other unusual drawing techniques: wet sheet, spray or stamps, and so on.
What to buy


Finger paints 6 or 12 colors from AliExpress, from 781 rubles ‚Üí


Set for drawing with AliExpress, 1 302 rubles ‚Üí


Set for drawing stamps with AliExpress, 59 rubles ‚Üí


Finger paints of six colors from Jovi, 904 rubles ‚Üí


Set for drawing with light from "Light paintings", 1 447 rubles ‚Üí


Set for drawing with chalk from Tiger Tribe, 1 290 rubles ‚Üí


Set for drawing from Tiger Tribe, 1 290 rubles ‚Üí


Toy kitchen for a little housewife
After three years, the child actively tries on various social roles: mothers, fathers, doctors, hairdressers, and so on. Gifts for role-playing games can and should be differentiated by gender.
Girls can give baby dolls, which they will feed, bathe and put to sleep. The more accessories the toy has, the more interesting. Take a closer look at dolls with prams, cribs and bathtubs.



No less delight will cause a gift on the culinary theme. That there isn‚Äôt anything for the girl to cook like a mother: from colorful sets of dishes to plastic products that can be cut, and carts from the supermarket for shopping.



You can buy a whole kitchen module with a stove, oven, dishes and other utensils. It is more expensive, but it looks very impressive.
What to buy


Interactive baby doll with AliExpress, 657 rubles ‚Üí


Doll with bathing accessories in the bathroom with AliExpress, 1 662 rubles ‚Üí


A set of toy products from AliExpress, from 879 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive baby doll with accessories from Karapuz, 2 935 rubles ‚Üí


Kitchen toy set "Learning to cook" from Mary Poppins, 1 199 rubles ‚Üí


Game set "Italian Pizzeria" from Mary Poppins, 595 rubles ‚Üí


Small electronic kitchen, 1 785 rubles ‚Üí


Electronic kitchen "Chef" from Altacto, 2,262 rubles ‚Üí


Tool kit for the young master
At the youngest preschool age, children imitate adults. If the son saw dad with a hammer or screwdriver, he will also want to screw something, nail or saw off. Therefore, a great gift for boys' role-playing games are tool kits.
It can be just a set of plastic imitations of keys, files and the like, or a set with a case or a drawer (all in an adult way).



The composition of the sets is diverse. Somewhere only screwdrivers and pliers, somewhere even a chainsaw and helmet. There are also game modules that simulate a carpentry workshop.



Fans of the Montessori system will like wooden tools that develop the cognitive abilities of the child.



Bright large tool sets will definitely attract the attention of boys, and there is plenty to choose from.
What to buy


A set of toy tools from AliExpress, 584 rubles ‚Üí


A set of wooden toy tools with AliExpress, 1 740 rubles ‚Üí


A set of toy tools with a chainsaw with AliExpress, 433 rubles ‚Üí


A set of toy tools in a case from Our Toy, 1 385 rubles ‚Üí


Large toy workbench with tools from HTI, 3 099 rubles ‚Üí


A set of toy tools with a drill in a case, 951 rubles ‚Üí


A set of wooden toy tools in a suitcase from Janod, 4,590 rubles ‚Üí


5 to 9 years old
In preschool children, games are already more complicated and diverse, rules and competition appear in them. Sports and fantasy games are added to subject and plot role-playing games. The growing interest in children is the construction.
At seven years old, the child is again in crisis. The kid goes to school, learns that he, like adults, has responsibilities. Educational activities interfere with game activity. At the same time, memory is actively developing, thinking becomes visual-figurative, and then verbal-logical.
Magnetic easel or training board
Many parents buy or make kids busy boards. Then they are replaced by magnetic and slate easels, where the child first simply draws, and later learns the alphabet and counting.



If you already have an easel, you can give a separate educational board with an alphabet or numbers.



And if the family does not yet have such a thing, this will be a great gift for boys and girls over five years old.
What to buy


Double-sided easel with AliExpress, 2 013 rubles ‚Üí


Fairy bilateral easel, 1 474 rubles ‚Üí


Educational board with the alphabet from AliExpress, 819 rubles ‚Üí


Educational two-sided easel with the alphabet from Zhorya, 1 019 rubles ‚Üí


Training board with numbers from Djeco, 1 479 rubles ‚Üí


Favorite Character Collection
By the age of 4‚Äì5, children begin to watch cartoons thoughtfully, or read magazines and books with the help of adults. Favorite characters gradually appear, interest in collecting wakes up.
As we once collected icons and toys from chocolate eggs, modern children collect figures of their favorite characters. They just have their idols.
For example, many are crazy about minions, smeshariki, and fixatives.



Girls collect fairy figures from the Winx Club and ponies from the animated series My Little Pony.



Boys like bionicles, ninJago and Star Wars characters from LEGO, as well as car models.



It is important to know your child, to give a character who is really interesting to him.
What to buy


Minion soft toy with AliExpress, 691 rubles ‚Üí


Soft toy "Malysharik Hedgehog" from "Multi-Remote", 1,594 rubles ‚Üí


Soft toy "Fix Simka" from "Multi-Remote", 500 rubles ‚Üí

Set of ponies from the animated series My Little Pony with AliExpress, from 518 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive figure "Princess Celestia" from the cartoon My Little Pony from Hasbro, 1 399 rubles ‚Üí


A set of 24 ninja figures with AliExpress, 945 rubles ‚Üí


Figure Kylo Ren from Star Wars, 1 172 rubles ‚Üí


Car models from AliExpress, 825 rubles ‚Üí


Set of typewriters Hot Wheels from Mattel, 1 259 rubles ‚Üí


Constructor
‚ÄúThe designer was presented with a child, and he opened the box and ran away,‚Äù parents often complain. The reason is that they did not take into account the temperament of their child.
It will be interesting for a diligent phlegmatic to figure out a wooden designer and build a fabulous house, and a creative melancholic kid will surely like 3D cardboard puzzles.



To mobile sanguine people and choleric people a designer is suitable, with which you do not need to sit at the table. For example, with a set of shaggy sticky balls you can simulate literally on the go.



You can find a wide variety of designers that will interest both girls and boys.
What to buy


Wooden designer with AliExpress, 1 727 rubles ‚Üí


3D cardboard puzzles with AliExpress, 130 rubles ‚Üí


The designer of fluffy balls with AliExpress, 492 rubles ‚Üí


Designer "Car Park" from ND Play, 850 rubles ‚Üí


Wooden constructor "Solar Farm" from "Lesovichka", 730 rubles ‚Üí


Cardboard 3D puzzle "Stylish Villa" from Zilipoo, 742 rubles ‚Üí


Table game
Board games are a great pastime for the whole family. But they should also be selected taking into account the individual characteristics of the child. Age on the box is just one of the guidelines. Remember also the character and hobbies of the baby.
Children who like math and logic tasks can be presented with a wooden tetris or a tangram puzzle for the New Year. The essence of the latter is to add the figures indicated on the cards. You can play alone, and if there are several sets, you can compete against time.



Children with a twinkle need more gambling tables: from the classic kicker to walkers with a playing field and dice, where you need to overtake your opponents and score points. Also, boys and girls can be carried away by jenga and various mnemonic games.



Separately, it is worth mentioning the popular challenge games: ‚ÄúCake in the Face‚Äù (Pie Face), ‚ÄúBad Dog‚Äù (Bad Dog), ‚ÄúSpitting Camel‚Äù and others. The attitude of psychologists, teachers and parents to them is ambiguous. On the one hand, it is fun, and on the other hand, the educational and developmental components tend to zero. Write in the comments how you feel about challenge games.
If you choose a New Year's gift not for your child, ask your parents if they approve of such games.
What to buy


Tangram puzzle with tasks from KriBly Boo, 341 rubles ‚Üí


Wooden Tetris from AliExpress, 462 rubles ‚Üí


Updated Jenga from Hasbro, 1 126 rubles ‚Üí


Table football from Stiga, 5,999 rubles ‚Üí


Children's chess for training memory with AliExpress, 787 rubles ‚Üí


The game "Cake in the face" with AliExpress, from 599 rubles ‚Üí


Interactive game "Spitting Camel" from Fotorama, 1 007 rubles ‚Üí


The game "Bad Dog" with AliExpress, 968 rubles ‚Üí


What to give a boy 5-9 years old for New Year
During this period, gender differentiation intensifies in children. Another boy may even be offended by a girl's present. Therefore, here are a few ideas for Christmas gifts purely for boys.
Railway or auto track
The market has a huge selection of railways and auto tracks. Realistic remote-controlled railways are especially popular.



This is a classic of the genre. Who in childhood did not dream of a railway and a cool garage for cars? Such a gift will delight both a calm child and a fidget.
What to buy


Auto track with AliExpress, from 940 rubles ‚Üí


Railway with remote control from AliExpress, from 1,554 rubles ‚Üí


Railroad with dinosaurs from Mattel, 2 499 rubles ‚Üí


Auto track with accessories from 1Toy, 799 rubles ‚Üí


Auto track with loops from "Toys", 467 rubles ‚Üí


Radio-controlled toys
By the way, about toys with remote controls. Radio-controlled helicopters, mini quadrocopters, tanks, trucks - all this will surely appeal to boys of younger and even older school age.



Are your eyes scattering? Can't choose? Then just buy a cute flying minion.



What to buy


Radio-controlled tank with AliExpress, 1 229 rubles ‚Üí


Toy truck with AliExpress, from 2 263 rubles ‚Üí


Radio-controlled robot car from Tongde, 1 209 rubles ‚Üí

Flying Minion with AliExpress, 606 rubles ‚Üí


Toy walkie-talkies
At this age, boys often play war games, portray policemen or firefighters. Assault rifles, pistols and other weapons are usually a lot of every boy. But walkie-talkies, on which you can talk with allies, will be new to many.
Here, for example, is a classic model with a communication range of up to 3 km.



But the walkie-talkie.



What to buy


A set of two walkie-talkies with a communication range of up to 3 km with AliExpress, 816 rubles ‚Üí


A set of two walkie-talkies in the form of watches with AliExpress, 528 rubles ‚Üí


A set of two walkie-talkies in space style from "Toys", 469 rubles ‚Üí


A set of two walkie-talkies from Motorola, 2 150 rubles ‚Üí


A set of two walkie-talkies from "Toys", 469 rubles ‚Üí


What to give a girl 5‚Äì9 years old for New Year
Barbie and Princess Dolls
Barbie dolls appeared in 1959, and for almost 60 years now girls all over the world dress and comb these beauties. Original Barbies are quite expensive, especially when bundled with Ken, home, and other extras.
But now there are many variations for every taste. In addition, dolls in the images of Disney princesses are popular: Anna and Elsa from Frozen, Cinderella, Rapunzel and others.



If the girl already has such dolls, look at the accessories: furniture, clothes, jewelry, dishes, and so on.



What to buy


A set of 5 accessories for Barbie dolls with AliExpress, from 262 rubles ‚Üí


Dressing table for dolls with Aliexpress, 221 rubles ‚Üí


Furniture and accessories for dolls with AliExpress, from 76 rubles ‚Üí


Dishes for dolls with AliExpress, 87 rubles ‚Üí


Dolls in the style of the cartoon "Frozen" with AliExpress, 793 rubles ‚Üí


Barbie doll in the form of a Mermaid from Mattel, 1 839 rubles ‚Üí

Mattel doll bed, 1 889 rubles ‚Üí


Palace with a carriage and furniture from Keenway, 1 600 rubles ‚Üí


Jewelry Set
Girls at this time wake up interest in needlework. Therefore, creativity kits are a great gift for senior preschool children and junior high school students.
There are many options. There are sets with beads and fishing lines for creating bracelets and beads.



There are sets for weaving bracelets from elastic bands.



What to buy


A set for creating bracelets and beads with AliExpress, from 804 rubles ‚Üí


A set of rubber bands for weaving bracelets with AliExpress, 303 rubles ‚Üí


A set for creating jewelry with charms from Bondibon, 829 rubles ‚Üí


Set for creativity "Loom" from Creative, 2 190 rubles ‚Üí


Studio for weaving bracelets and baubles from Cool Maker, 1 447 rubles ‚Üí


10 to 15 years old
This period is characterized by the transition from childhood to an independent and responsible adult life. Breaking is sometimes painful. Children feel that they are growing up and want to be treated accordingly.
Teenagers have their first serious hobbies: favorite group, favorite soccer player, favorite writer. Boys try to behave like real men (show strength and endurance, do not show fear) and attract the attention of girls who also turn into women (pay attention to clothes, are interested in cosmetics and so on).
Sports equipment
If the child is involved in sports, choosing a gift is easy. A football player will be happy with a new ball or boots, a runner with a fitness bracelet and so on. If funds permit, give a gyro scooter. This is fashionable now.



If you are only trying to introduce your child to sports, give winter equipment so that you can immediately try it out (skiing, ice skating, snowboarding) without waiting for the summer. In the order of hooliganism, you can complement the gift with a snowball machine and arrange family snow fights.



What to buy


Giroskuter Mekotron HoverBoard, 9 990 rubles ‚Üí


Snowball molding machine with AliExpress, 165 rubles ‚Üí


Soccer ball from Lamborghini, 749 rubles ‚Üí


Snowball mold from Happy Baby, 349 rubles ‚Üí


Sliding skates from Action, 2 175 rubles ‚Üí


Hockey skates from Nordway, 2 199 rubles ‚Üí


Jump rope with a counter from Lite Weights, 229 rubles ‚Üí


Research and beauty kits
Now many six- and seventh-graders are actively interested in science. Such children can safely give a microscope, a telescope, a starry sky projector, kits for chemical and physical experiments.



With the onset of puberty, teens pay more and more attention to their appearance. In this regard, boys can be given perfumes or personal hygiene products. For girls, there are interesting kits for creating your own fragrances, home soap or bath bombs. Well, the fair sex is sure to please the first cosmetics. Just be attentive to the quality of the products: adolescents have delicate and moody skin.
What to buy


Microscope from Levenhuk, 6 590 rubles ‚Üí


Research kit "Chemical Laboratory" from ND Play, 560 rubles ‚Üí


Set for the experiments "Magic of Light" from Kosmos, 2 088 rubles ‚Üí


Set of experiments "My Laboratory: Perfumes" by Science4you, 899 rubles ‚Üí


DIY Lip Balm Set by Master IQ2, 529 rubles ‚Üí


Gift set of decorative cosmetics from Bondibon, 935 rubles ‚Üí


Set "DIY soap: flowers" from Molly, 592 rubles ‚Üí


Game console
The PlayStation 4 Pro and Xbox One S will make any teenage boy happy (and many girls too).
If the game console is already there and you do not plan to update it, take a look at the accessories. You can give a joystick, steering wheel or virtual reality glasses.



VR helmets are generally a separate category of gifts that you should pay attention to. Actual and will delight a teenager who monitors the development of technology. If you don‚Äôt understand anything about this, read Lifehacker's article on how to choose virtual reality glasses.
What to buy


Game console PlayStation Classic, 2 990 rubles ‚Üí


Virtual reality glasses with a joystick Samsung Gear VR, 7 490 rubles ‚Üí


Virtual reality glasses VR Box 2.0, 1 250 rubles ‚Üí


Nintendo Switch game console with Mario Kart 8 Deluxe, 24 990 rubles ‚Üí


Game steering wheel Defender Forsage GTR, 3 399 rubles ‚Üí


Gamepad Logitech F710, 3 290 rubles ‚Üí


Headphones
Teens listen to music often and a lot. Nowadays, wireless headphones are becoming increasingly popular. This article by Lifehacker will help you make the right choice.
For centenials, not only convenience and quality are important, but also design. Therefore, look at the bright and stylish headphones.



What to buy


Over-ear headphones with backlight from AliExpress, from 1 031 rubles ‚Üí


Wired headset JBL C100SI, 699 rubles ‚Üí


On-ear headphones Pioneer SE-MJ503-K, 2 600 rubles ‚Üí


Headphones in-ear Elari NanoPods, 4 990 rubles ‚Üí


Intro BI-990 in-ear headphones, 2,290 rubles ‚Üí


Headphones Beats EP, 5 499 rubles ‚Üí


Wireless headphones House of Marley Positive Vibration, 4 290 rubles ‚Üí


Headphones JBL JR300BT, 2 290 rubles ‚Üí


Smartphone
Whether we like it or not, but in the youth subculture, what kind of phone you go with does matter. The minimum set of functions is a good camera and access to social networks.
Decent models can be found in Asian brands Xiaomi, Meizu, Huawei, Lenovo. The choice of a specific one depends on the budget that you devote to New Year's gifts.



What to buy


Smartphone Honor 10 Lite, 11 990 rubles ‚Üí


Smartphone Xiaomi Redmi 7A, 7 990 rubles ‚Üí


Smartphone Honor 7A, 6 990 rubles ‚Üí


Smartphone Samsung Galaxy J4, 9 990 rubles ‚Üí


Smartphone Huawei Y6 lite, 8 990 rubles ‚Üí


Smartphone Meizu M6, 8 490 rubles ‚Üí


Choosing a New Year's gift for a child is not as difficult as it seems. Write in the comments which idea inspired you the most.

Note! All prices are valid at the time of publication of the collection. Stores can update the value of goods throughout the day.


UPD. The text was updated on November 2, 2019: more products were added to it and current prices were set.
